cannot_overdraw: You cannot overdraw your account! If you are already in the negative, you can only make deposits.
no_standing_orders: There are no standing orders for this account yet.
exec_on_last_day_of_month: Execute on the Last Day of the Month
pick_name_and_currency: Please choose a name and currency for the new account. Caution! Currency cannot be changed later.
confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this account? This action cannot be undone!
confirm_import: Are you sure you want to import these accounts? This will overwrite the existing accounts.
no_transactions: There are no transactions for the selected time period.
fill_in_all_fields: Please fill in all fields and enter valid values.
confirm_standing_order_delete: Do you really want to delete this standing order?
confirm_transaction_delete: Do you really want to delete this transaction?
